ca.hullabaloo.util.sax
Class ProxyContentHandler

java.lang.Object
  ca.hullabaloo.util.sax.ProxyContentHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
public class ProxyContentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.ContentHandler

Content Handler that passes the events it receives to a parent content handler.

          Creates a new ProxyContentHandler object.
